channel.title: Need some major 317 help!
channel.description:
Right, thing is, i'm shit at scripting.
The only thing i can do is see patterns, and learn off things already used in the source. For example, i can create cmds, just by looking at how the one above works. (I know that's easy).
But, i just need some help with the following problems;
Customs Minigames Shops (Moving them around, changing items, names, prices, NPC speaking, and moving/or not) Moving mobs, their drops, drop rates, and movement. EXP Rates for all skills. My default chat style/colour on my client seems to be some effect. I basically want that back to normal. How to disable/enable admins from trading/dropping etc. Tabs Quests How to make items drop/spawn on the ground in certain locations How to make staff-only objects. How to change the default port and server-ip, so you don't have to manually change it to XXX everytime... How to change the default username and password, so you don't have to enter it. (owner only) How to change what you get, when you steal from NPC's or stalls. How to remove all 'nulls' from the game. How to make safe and unsafe pking zones. How to make global objects.
If you can help me with any of these, it would be greatly appreciated !

item.title: Need some major 317 help!
item.dc:creator: @whyprod whyprod
item.description:
@whyprod wrote:

customs is client sided not client.java but client!!!

you need to download models and then put them in the client folder names models and then you will have them, better to watch a youtube video about it.

moving npc’s and shops and stuff can be done on the source - to help you out go on to the npc you want to move,

such as ‘’ bob ‘’ and the type ::mypos get the x and y and then say if it’ 3228,9181 , go on to the source and type Ctrl + F and the search 3228 and change them to where they need to go hope i helped :L

Read full topic

item.title: Need some major 317 help!
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

It’s a bunch of files, and i seem to have a massive error atm, that i don’t know how to fix. But, there’s one other thing, and it’s Nulls… everywhere…

Read full topic

item.title: Need some major 317 help!
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

There are many tutorials on all that you’ve stated. I suggest you use the search bar, or another forums for there guides. Trust me we all started where you were, at least I know I did, and progressed a lot with Moparscape.

Read full topic

But, what does PI/Delta mean? :L[/quote]-facedesk-

do you see a bunch of folders like src? or is it all a bunch of files?

The only thing i can do is see patterns, and learn off things already used in the source. For example, i can create cmds, just by looking at how the one above works. (I know that’s easy).
